title: Sight Word Stories: Guided Reading Level A: Fun Books That Teach 25 Sight Words to Help New Readers Soar (Scholastic Guided Reading Level a)
features: Jumpstart your child’s reading ability with these irresistible titles focused on the first 25 sight words!

This bright red box contains 25 little books that each teach a must-know sight word via a playful, easy-to-read story. Characters include pugs, bugs, monsters, talking boots, silly superheroes, and more to make learning extra enjoyable. Comes with a parent guide, mini-workbook, and motivating stickers. Books are correlate with Guided Reading Level A.
description: Liza Charlesworth is the editor and author of hundreds of books and teaching materials including AlphaTales, First Little Readers, Just-Right Readers, Buddy Readers, First Little Comics, and Sight Word Stories. She is the recipient of 12 Ed Press Awards and three Teachers Choice Honors. She lives in New York City with her husband and twin sons, who provide daily inspiration.

title: Sight Word Stories Reading Level A
